bonded.configuration.title: Bonded
bonded.config.upgrading_enabled.tooltip: If enabled players can upgrade gear on tool benches when the gear reaches max level.
bonded.config.repairing_enabled.tooltip: If enabled players can repair gear on repair benches.
bonded.config.levels_to_upgrade.tooltip: To what level a gear can level. Once a gear is max level it can be upgraded.
